translations: 使……根深蒂固；就……原料染色；生染
固有品质；原纱染色；生染的纤维
生染的；原纱染色的；根深蒂固的

sentences.sentence: Instead, the new habits we deliberately ingrain into ourselves create parallel pathways that can bypass those old roads.
sentences.translation: 相反，我们故意让自己养成的新习惯创造了平行的路径，可以绕过那些旧的路径。

sentences.sentence: Training camp, he said, will quickly ingrain those principles.
sentences.translation: 他说训练营会很快让那些原则根深蒂固。

sentences.sentence: Never put forward your excellent track records but ingrain favor received.
sentences.translation: 永远不要提出你的优秀，而是让一致的认可根深蒂固。
